DOC.brief_title: "Clinical Evaluation of Opto-Acoustic Tomography for Detection and Diagnostic Differentiation of Thyroid Nodules"
DOC.criteria: Have an undiagnosed suspicious solid or mostly solid thyroid nodule Have received recommendation for and are scheduled for biopsy Previous or ongoing radioactive iodine treatment. Have greater than 2 nodules (1 in each lobe) recommended for biopsy at baseline Previous biopsy of target nodule
